resources.string: Just Lyrics is a site that aims to provide a very important service. The retrieval of lyrics!
To often we find ourselves singing along to our favourite songs, but when the music cuts out... we are left mumbling and stumbling through the few verses we know.

We created Just Lyrics to help ease the burden of forgetfulness. This application is for karaoke enthusiasts, for those who strive to understand the deeper meaning of songs, or just for people who can\'t understand a word of what\'s being said.
Simply search an artist and track to begin your journey!
*Unfortunately our API agreement only allows 30% of lyrics to be retrieved. If you would like to learn more visit the MusiXMatch Website.*
